EN: Town Center
The Town Center provides the foundation necessary to grow your city.
Allows building a farm and a lumbermill. Town center can hold a maximum of 700 crop, 700 wood, and 200 iron.
Enables building Barracks. Increases the maximum resources to 1100 crop, 1100 wood, and 300 iron.
Allows building University. Increases the maximum resources to 1600 crop, 1600 wood, and 500 iron.
Ability to build another Farm. Increases the maximum resources to 2500 crop, 2500 wood, and 800 iron.
Allows building Trading Posts. Increases the maximum resources to 3800 crop, 3800 wood, and 1200 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 5700 crop, 5700 wood, and 1800 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 8700 crop, 8700 wood, and 2800 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 13200 crop, 13200 wood, and 4400 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 20100 crop, 20100 wood, and 6800 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 30000 crop, 30000 wood, and 10000 iron.

Trains advanced military units without requiring laborers.
Allows training Swordsmen and Archers.
Allows training Hoplite.
Enables upgrading Swordsman, Hoplite and Bowman.
Improves barrack strength.
Decreases training time by 5%.
Decreases training time by 10%.

Decreases training time by 20%.

Training Ground
Trains laborers into military units and provides defensive structures.
Allows training Fighters and Bowmen.
Allows building defensive Towers.
Enables upgrading Fighters and Bowmen.
Ability to research 5 for the price of 4.
Decreases training time by 5%. Allows converting the structure to a Barrack.

Uses the city's laborers to grow and produce crops. Ability to build Stables at higher level.

Use the city's laborers to produce wood and develop underground storage to protect resources.
Allows gathering wood from level 1 forests.
Allows gathering wood from level 1 forests. Ability to build Basements to protect resources.
Allows gathering wood from level 2 forests.
Allows gathering wood from level 2 forests. Can gather from 2 forests simultaneously.

Use the city's laborers to produce iron.
Allows a maximum of 100 laborers to work in the refinery. Produce 1 iron per hour for every 7 laborers.

Foundry
Allow the city's laborer to use wood to repair buildings after they have been damaged in combat. Ability to remove structures and build Refinery at higher levels.
Assign your city's laborers to repair damaged structures.
Increases to a maximum of 10 laborers. One labor can repair up to 5 HP every 30 minutes.
Increases to a maximum of 20 laborers. One labor can repair up to 5 HP every 30 minutes. Enables researching A-Call-To-Arm Technology.
Increases to a maximum of 30 laborers. One labor can repair up to 5 HP every 30 minutes. Upgrade Underground Architectural Research.
Increases to a maximum of 40 laborers. One labor can repair up to 5 HP every 30 minutes. Ability to remove structures.
Increases to a maximum of 50 laborers. One labor can repair up to 5 HP every 30 minutes. Ability to build a Refinery.

Trading Post
Allows sending caravans with resources to other players. Gives the ability to build Market and Tribal Festivals.
Ability to send a maximum of 200 resources. Ability to build a tribal gathering that increases laborers' prodction by 30% for 8 hours!
Increase ability to send a maximum of 400 resources.
Increase ability to send a maximum of 600 resources. Allows training Ox Wagon.

Lumbering Camp
The camp is used by laborers to collect wood from Forests.
Tribal Gathering
A temporary tent where tribesmen hang out, get drunk and have a great time!
Shorten time required to produce new labors by up to 30% for 8 hours. (Nonstackable)

A temporary tent where tribesmen hang out, get drunk and have a great time!
